Debate about the Earth, Takeuchi, Uyeda & Kanamori, 1970, p.71

"When arguments are thus specialized, it is all but impossible for a layman to judge which argument is reliable. Each scientist can more or less draw arbitrary conclusions, depending on his basic experience and attitude."
